code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{X,Move,Settings}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WidgetContainer=_ref=>{let{widget,onRemove,onConfigure,onMove}=_ref;const[isDragging,setIsDragging]=useState(false);const handleDragStart=e=>{setIsDragging(true);e.dataTransfer.effectAllowed='move';e.dataTransfer.setData('widgetId',widget.id);};const handleDragEnd=()=>{setIsDragging(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{draggable:true,onDragStart:handleDragStart,onDragEnd:handleDragEnd,style:{background:'#fff',borderRadius:'8px',border:'1px solid #e5e7eb',padding:'16px',marginBottom:'16px',opacity:isDragging?0.5:1,cursor:'move',position:'relative'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',alignItems:'center',marginBottom:'12px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{style:{fontSize:'14px',fontWeight:'600',margin:0},children:widget.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',gap:'8px'},children:[onConfigure&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onConfigure(widget),style:{background:'none',border:'none',cursor:'pointer',padding:'4px',display:'flex',alignItems:'center'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Settings,{size:14,color:"#666"})}),onRemove&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onRemove(widget.id),style:{background:'none',border:'none',cursor:'pointer',padding:'4px',display:'flex',alignItems:'center'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(X,{size:14,color:"#666"})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{minHeight:'100px'},children:widget.component})]});};export default WidgetContainer;
